mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM merchandise
info LIKE '%' || #{gSearch} || '%'
SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM merchandise WHERE majorc = 'app'
AND info LIKE '%' || #{gSearch} || '%'

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE majorc = 'app'
AND info LIKE '%' || #{gSearch} || '%'
AND subc LIKE '%' || #{subc} || '%' ORDER BY num DESC) a
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) b WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE majorc = 'app'
AND info LIKE '%' || #{gSearch} || '%'
AND subc LIKE '%' || #{subc} || '%' ORDER BY readcount DESC) a
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) b WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE majorc = 'app'
AND info LIKE '%' || #{gSearch} || '%'
AND subc LIKE '%' || #{subc} || '%' ORDER BY price ASC) a
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) b WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE majorc = 'app'
AND info LIKE '%' || #{gSearch} || '%'
AND subc LIKE '%' || #{subc} || '%' ORDER BY price DESC) a
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) b WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE majorc = 'app'
AND info LIKE '%' || #{gSearch} || '%'
AND subc LIKE '%' || #{subc} || '%' ORDER BY reg_date DESC) a
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) b WHERE rnum >= #{startRow}
